1: <pb/><e>B'ich re li taqsink.</e> <pb/><t>Cheloq'oni ru li Qaawa' chejunilex li nekexk'anjelak chiru,</t> <t>li wankex sa' rochoch li Qaawa' chiru q'oqyink!</t>
2: <t>Cheterq'usi leeruq' sa' xjayal li xloq'laj muheb'aal</t> <t>ut cheloq'oni ru li Qaawa'!</t>
3: <pb/><t>A' taxaq li Qaawa' chi'osob'tesinq aawe chalen chaq toj Si√≥n:</t> <t>a'an laj winqob'resihom re choxach'och'.</t>
